content: I think I'll share the recipe on my Facebook page, but I'll adapt it to fit Facebook's content style and use Facebook-specific features to make it more engaging. I'll also target a specific audience that might be more interested in cooking or food-related content. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I posted a quote about productivity on Facebook a few days ago, which received 9 likes and 1 comment from a friend who shared a similar quote. Do you think I should post more inspirational quotes like that?
